models.dice

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.dice.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object

    DiceBag Model Object

    this is a DiceBag in which you call upon it and roll any amount of dice that are any size.

    you can also add a modifier to the dice roll.

    Since:
    November 24, 2017
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Andres Hermilo Carrera

      DiceBag() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int rollDice(int sides, int amountOfDice)
      this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and returns the result.
      int rollDice(int sides, int amountOfDice, int modifier)
      this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and then adds a modifier to the result and returns that value.
      int rollDie(int sides)
      this method rolls a single die and returns the result.
      int rollDie(int sides, int modifier)
      this method rolls a single die and adds a modifier and returns the result.

    • Method Detail

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice(int sides,
                    int amountOfDice)
        this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        sides - the amount of sides of the dice being rolled.
        amountOfDice - the amount of dice being rolled.
        Returns:
        returns the amount rolled by the amount of dice of a certain size.

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice(int sides,
                    int amountOfDice,
                    int modifier)
        this method rolls a specified amount of dice of a specified size and then adds a modifier to the result and returns that value.
        Parameters:
        sides - the amount of sides on the die to be rolled.
        amountOfDice - the amount of dice that will be rolled.
        modifier - the modifier that will be added to the result.
        Returns:
        returns the result of value of all the dice you decided to roll plus the modifier.

      • rollDie

        public int rollDie(int sides)
        this method rolls a single die and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        sides - the amount of sides on the dice.
        Returns:
        returns the result of the dice that was being rolled of the specified amount of sides.

      • rollDie

        public int rollDie(int sides,
                   int modifier)
        this method rolls a single die and adds a modifier and returns the result.
        Parameters:
        sides - the amount of sides on the dice being rolled.
        modifier - modifier to the dice roll.
        Returns:
        returns the result of a dice roll plus modifier with the dice being rolled one of the sides.
